shots.description: Ordered shot sequence for the renderer. Index 0 = first frame of video. Each entry is self-contained with resolved asset_id values. When present, the renderer uses this array directly instead of inferring shots from resolved_assets.

background_asset_id.description: Resolved from ShotList.Shot.background_id via the two-step lookup: ShotList.background_id → AssetManifest_draft.backgrounds[bg_id].asset_id → this field. Must match an asset_id present in resolved_assets[].

character_asset_ids.description: Ordered list of resolved asset_ids for characters appearing in this shot. Each value must match an asset_id present in resolved_assets[].

vo_lines.description: Ordered VO lines assigned to this shot with timeline offsets relative to shot start. Empty array if the shot has no VO. Plan builders must ensure every timeline_out_ms ≤ duration_ms before emitting; the renderer clips at duration_ms at runtime as a safety net.

line_id.description: Matches AssetManifest_draft.vo_items[].item_id (and AssetManifest_final.items[].asset_id for resolved VO assets)

timeline_in_ms.description: Start offset in ms relative to shot start (0 = shot begins). Phase 0: evenly distributed approximation across shot duration. Phase 1: derived from real TTS audio file duration.

timeline_out_ms.description: End offset in ms relative to shot start. Plan builder validation rule: must be ≤ duration_ms. Renderer clips to duration_ms at runtime if violated.
